Interactive Demos

Try out my research models and tools directly in your browser

Experience my research in action! These interactive demos showcase various AI models and tools I’ve developed. All demos run directly in your browser - no installation required.

Featured Demos

FLaME Evaluation Interface

Test your language model against our financial benchmarks. Upload your model or use pre-loaded options to see how it performs on domain-specific tasks.

Features: Real-time scoring • Category breakdown • Performance visualization • Export results

Launch Demo View Code

Financial Q&A System

Ask complex financial questions and get AI-powered answers with source citations. Powered by GPT-4 with RAG integration.

Features: Source tracking • Multi-document analysis • Export capabilities

Launch Demo

Market Sentiment Analyzer

Analyze market sentiment from news articles and social media in real-time with advanced visualization.

Features: Live data feed • Sentiment visualization • Trend analysis

Launch Demo

Experiment with different prompting strategies for financial LLMs

Interactive tool for portfolio risk assessment using ML models

Explore and compare results from various LLM benchmarks

🔬 Model Analyzer

Model Playground

API Access

For programmatic access to these models:

from huggingface_hub import InferenceClient

# Initialize client
client = InferenceClient(
    "glennmatlin/finance-llm-7b",
    token="YOUR_HF_TOKEN"
)

# Make inference
response = client.text_generation(
    "What is the impact of rising interest rates on bond prices?",
    max_new_tokens=200
)
print(response)

Get API Key • Documentation • Examples
